title: Execute a Financial Swap Trade
description: A trader needs to hedge their exposure to floating gasoline prices. They decide to enter into a fixed-for-floating price swap.

tasks.description: Get the current market quotes for a gasoline price swap for the desired volume and time period.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of current bid/ask prices for the swap is retrieved from brokers.

tasks.description: Perform a pre-trade credit check on the proposed counterparty.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the counterparty has sufficient credit available for the trade.

tasks.description: Execute the swap trade with the chosen counterparty and book the deal in the trade capture system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The trade is executed and accurately recorded in the system of record.
